modulegroup.name: Catalog
modulegroup.description: Create a site navigation that is independent from the sitemap structure. You can categorize your articles either alphabetically or thematically, just by linking them to corresponding catalog categories.

modules.module: Allows to navigate through the catalog tree.
Generates an A-Z list of all catalog entries.
Allows users to subscribe to categories. Registered users will be notified by email if a category is changed.
Allows users to unsubscribe their subscriptions.
Prints out a list of catalog categories. Used in combination with a catalog content page like "Catalog Navigation Page".

module.name: Catalog Category List Post Request Navigation

modules.module: Prints out a list of catalog categories for post request navigation. Used in combination with a catalog content page like "Catalog Navigation Page".
Prints out a list of categories containing at least one link to a current topic.
Prints out an A-Z list. Used in combination with "A-Z List Page".
Prints out a limited list of catalog links.
A cronjob that sends emails to subscribers of catalog categories. Emails are only generated when a category has been changed.
